data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)
